participant_1.background:
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced.
since i have fibromyalgia , the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.
I enjoy crocheting in my spare time.
My business is growing, so I spend my days meeting with clients, booking venues, and coordinating vendors.

participant_2.background:
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
i m not going to go the extra mile anymore.
i am the youngest sibling in my family.
I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia.

content.text: I'm doing great thanks! I love that you enjoy celebrating Diwali with your family. I'm from India and it's one of my favorite holidays too.
That's so cool! I'm not Indian, but I love learning about different cultures and traditions. Diwali is so beautiful and festive.
It really is! I love the lights and the decorations. And the food is always amazing.
What's your favorite dish to eat on Diwali?
I love the shankarpali. They're these little fried pastries that are filled with a sweet and savory mixture.
Oh yum! I've never had those before, but they sound delicious.
You should definitely try them sometime! They're a Diwali tradition.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to work on my car, crochet, and spend time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love crocheting too. It's so relaxing.
It is! And it's a great way to make gifts for your friends and family.
That's true! I've made a lot of scarves and hats for my friends and family.
I've made a lot of blankets and baby clothes.
That's so nice! I'm sure your friends and family love them.
They do! I'm glad you like crocheting too.
Me too! It's a great hobby
